resources.string: The Tale of Two Bokies
name
Tale of Two Bokies Title Image
START THE STORY
Enter your name

Welcome to the story between two young Bokertons. The story begins with Alex in the early fall of 2014. After recently breaking up with his girlfriend, he is attending a high-school soccer game with his friend Ethan. Alex spots a beautiful girl in the stands, but is unsure if he should introduce himself.
Discuss recent break-up and add her on Facebook
Go Home

Alex went home that night and had butterflies in his stomach… After all, the best way to get over a dead dog is to get a puppy! Right? He grabbed his phone and immediatly invited Sawah beara over for a pizza dinner date at the 5 start Alex Basement Resort Spa House.
Accept his invitation
Decline the date

While Sarah had declined his pizza date, she was willing to give him a chance by inviting him over to a romantic picnic in her basement. Alex accepted of course and the love story gets to continue (since you tried to end it by declining his first date......) Where should these two love birds go for their 2nd date?
THE ZOO!
SIX FLAGS!
Disaster strikes… Alex has decided to attend Maryville University and will be moving 4 hours away. Unsure of a long distance relationship. Sarah must decide if Alex is worth waiting for?
Save money and move to St. Louis
Give up on Awexypoo

Long nights working at Wal-mart, days without speaking to Alex, and hours crying into wolfy\'s fur. Times were tough, but atleast they got to visit each other every other weekend! Whether it was Alex driving 4+ hours or Sawahypoo watching his track meets.
Move to St. Louis
The time is finally here. The wait is over. Together forever! An apartment in ST. LOUIS!

Alex went home that night and fell asleep like any other day. The love story ends here before it even got started. Both Sarah and Alex had one chance and they both let it slip away. Million of future memories will never exist.
Do you want to actually try this time?

The love story ends here before it even got started. Both Sarah and Alex had one chance and they both let it slip away. Million of future memories will never exist. I shouldn\'t even give you an option to restart the story!
Well it looks like the love story ends here… All of those long nights staying up were for nothing… I\'m not even going to give you the option to restart the story!
PENGUINS. POLAR BEARS. GIRAFFES?!?!? The only thing better than the zoo is a house with 100 doggies!
Complete successful date!
Up, down, left, right! Did I mention its hot as fuck? P.S. (I couldn\'t find an old picture of us at six flags. So this will have to do!
Complete successful date!
Well that was delicious! I think these bokie bears are actually falling in love! What is next on their list of adventures?
THE ZOO!
SIX FLAGS!
Story page image
Do you want to actually try this time?
